pages.disclaimers: AceGrove Casino Disclaimers - Terms of Service and Privacy Policies AceGrove HOME ABOUT US GAmes Contact AceGrove Casino - Disclaimers Welcome to the AceGrove Casino disclaimers. We encourage you to read this information carefully before creating an account or using our services. By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth herein. General Disclaimers The following disclaimers apply to all aspects of the AceGrove Casino website and its services: Age Restriction: You must be of legal gambling age in your jurisdiction to use this website. It is your responsibility to ensure you meet the legal requirements for gambling online. We perform age verification checks, and any attempt to bypass these checks will result in account termination and potential legal action. Jurisdictional Limitations: Gambling laws and regulations vary by jurisdiction. AceGrove Casino does not guarantee that online gambling is legal in your area. You are solely responsible for determining the legality of online gambling in your jurisdiction. Responsible Gambling: Gambling can be addictive. We encourage you to gamble responsibly and set limits on your deposits and playtime. We offer resources and tools to help you gamble responsibly. If you feel you may have a gambling problem, please seek help from a professional organization. Fair Play: AceGrove Casino is committed to fair play for all users. We use industry-standard random number generators (RNGs) to ensure the randomness and fairness of all our games. Accuracy of Information: We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our website. However, we cannot guarantee that all information is entirely error-free. We reserve the right to correct any errors or inaccuracies at any time. Website Availability: We strive to make the AceGrove Casino website available 24/7. However, we cannot guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service. The website may be down for maintenance or due to unforeseen circumstances. Intellectual Property: All content on the AceGrove Casino website, including text, graphics, logos, trademarks, and software, is the property of AceGrove Casino or its licensors. You may not copy, reproduce, modify, publish, distribute, transmit, or commercially exploit any content without our written permission. Game Disclaimers The following disclaimers apply specifically to the games offered on the AceGrove Casino website: Game Outcomes: The outcome of all games on the AceGrove Casino website is determined by a random number generator (RNG). There is no skill involved in playing these games. The house always has an edge. Return to Player (RTP): Each game on the AceGrove Casino website has a theoretical RTP (Return to Player) percentage. This percentage represents the average amount of money that will be paid back to players over a long period. The RTP is based on statistical analysis and does not guarantee any individual player's results. Malfunctions: In the event of a game malfunction, all affected wagers will be void. We will use reasonable efforts to identify and resolve any malfunctions as soon as possible. Financial Disclaimers The following disclaimers apply to all financial transactions on the AceGrove Casino website: Payment Methods: We offer various payment methods for deposits and withdrawals. Please refer to our banking section for details on available methods, fees, and processing times. Deposit Limits: We may impose limits on the amount you can deposit into your account. These limits are set to promote responsible gambling and may vary depending on your account status. Withdrawal Limits: We may impose limits on the amount you can withdraw from your account. These limits are set to comply with regulatory requirements and may vary depending on your account status and withdrawal method. Verification Procedures: We may require you to undergo verification procedures before processing withdrawals. These procedures help to prevent fraud and money laundering. Exchange Rates: If you are depositing or withdrawing funds in a currency different from your account currency, exchange rates may apply. pages.privacy-policy: AceGrove Casino Privacy Policy - Your Data Protection AceGrove HOME ABOUT US GAmes Contact AceGrove Casino - Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how AceGrove Casino ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website (the "Service") and the choices you have associated with that data. Information We Collect AceGrove Casino may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and other details when you register an account, participate in promotions, or communicate with us through our website or other channels. We may also collect demographic information and preferences to improve our services. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, communicate with you, process transactions, and comply with legal obligations. We may analyze user behavior and preferences to offer tailored promotions and enhance our marketing efforts. Information Security AceGrove Casino takes reasonable precautions to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. We use industry-standard security measures such as encryption and access controls to safeguard your data. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Sharing of Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent, except as required by law or to trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you. We may share aggregated or anonymized information that does not identify individuals for marketing or analytical purposes. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze trends, administer the website, track users' movements around the site, and gather demographic information. You can control cookies through your browser settings or by opting out of certain tracking technologies, although this may affect the functionality of the website. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, update, or delete your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your personal information or request a restriction on its processing. To exercise these rights or inquire about our data practices, please contact us using the information provided below. Changes to This Privacy Policy AceGrove Casino reserves the right to update or change this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated policy on this page. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates. Security We are committed to protecting your personal information. We use a variety of security measures to protect your Personal Information, including secure servers, firewalls, and data encryption. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with Personal Information, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Information from a child without verification of parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information from our servers.
